Html:
it's possible create a file xls from html code?

How?

PHPExcel cannot (as yet) read HTML files. I had done some work on this using PHP's DOM, but it proved incapable of converting most of my test cases cleanly. While I have some ideas for alternative ways to handle this, at present it means that you'd have to write something yourself to read the HTML and convert it to a PHPExcel object before it could be saved as an xls file.
